Sergio Marchionne told dealers and industry executives he believes it is important that Chrysler maintain its "American nature." That American nature needs to be preserved for its ultimate success, he said to applause. "We can open up the world to Chrysler, we can do a number of things, but I can not turn it into an Italian car company."
